meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable gas used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers handled propenes carefully due to their flammable nature.
meanings.sent2: The propenes were essential in creating the plastic materials for the new toys.
meanings.sent3: The propenes decided to have a party in the plastic factory.
meanings.sent4: The propenes danced around the factory, transforming into colorful plastic products.
meanings.sent5: The propenes whispered secrets of plastic production in the workers' ears.
